Macklemore films with his granny in Modesto Rapper Macklemore was in Modesto, Calif. in mid-June filming with his grandmother, who lives in town. He made various stops around the city including WinCo, Second Chance Consignment, and Foundation Tattoo. Photos and video clips provided by: Sarah Teter. title: Macklemore’s new video starring his 99-year-old grandma is ‘Glorious,’ fans declare

twitter.title: Macklemore’s new video starring his 99-year-old grandma is ‘Glorious,’ fans declare
twitter.description: Macklemore’s new video, “Glorious,” is making all his fans want to run and call their grannies. The video shows the rapper spending a “glorious,” fun-filled day with his grandmother ahead of her 100th birthday.
